Summary: ufo present in space shuttle footage 02-01-03
divs: Sighting Details1. At homewatching news of Columbia disaster.2. When it flew past the lower right hand corner of the footage shown.3. Definitely a disc shaped ufo.4. I was shocked, as i mentioned it to my wife, she has bad eyes,didnt see it.Iwas then very excited I had experienced the sighting.5. As I had previously stated, It came flying from the bottom of the picturevery fast,at the right hand bottom of the screen to the right side veryfast,then disappeared from the picture6. As stated ,it flew out of view of the photographer. the station was ,Ibelieve WFAO- in possibly Albuquerque, N.M. We were watching CNN throughourlocal channel 3, here in Phoenix,Az. I cant believe I was the only person whosaw this ufo6
trends: There have been no other sightings in Belen
This sighting has never been favorited.
